name: Donella Hornwood
text: Reduce the cost of the first loyal card you marshal or play each round by 1.

name: Craven
text:
Terminal.
Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker.

name: Balon Greyjoy
text: Renown. Balon Greyjoy does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge against an opponent who does not control a King character. Action: Kneel a [greyjoy] location to give each loyal character you control +1 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

name: Ours is the Old Way
text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, either: each [greyjoy] character you control gains stealth, or each non-[greyjoy] character loses stealth.

name: Starfall Cavalry
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Starfall Cavalry enters play, draw 1 card. (3 cards instead if there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile.)

name: Venomous Blade
text: [martell] character you control only. Ambush (3). Attached character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After Venomous Blade enters play, place a poison token on a character with printed STR 2 or lower. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character.

name: Kings of Summer
text: You cannot include Winter plot cards in your plot deck. Increase the reserve value on each player's revealed plot card by 1. While there are no Winter plot cards revealed, increase the gold value on your revealed Summer plot card by 1.

name: Kings of Winter
text: You cannot include Summer plot cards in your plot deck. Reduce the reserve value on each player's revealed plot card by 1. While you have a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the gold value on each opponent's non-Summer plot card by 1.

name: Summer Harvest
text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. X is 2 higher than the printed gold value on that player's revealed plot card.

name: Winter Festival
text: Interrupt: When the challenge phase ends, if there are no Summer plot cards revealed, gain 2 power for your faction.
